price: 118. Ee noo kala garsoor aniga iyo iyaga garsoor (xaq ah), ina badbaadi aniga iyo kuwa ila jira ee mu'miniinta ah.
arabic: فَٱفۡتَحۡ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَهُمۡ فَتۡحٗا وَنَجِّنِي وَمَن مَّعِيَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-if'taḥ baynī wabaynahum fatḥan wanajjinī waman maʿiya mina al-mu'minīna
